name: Chrysanthemum leucanthemum
details: Ox-eye Daisy. Has specific action on sudoriparous glands. Quiets nervous system like CYPRIPEDIUM. Right sided tearing pain in bones of jaw and temple. Pain in teeth and gums, worse touch, better warmth. Irritable and tearful. Here use 12X. INSOMNIA AND NIGHT-SWEATS. For colliquative sweating and hyperaesthesia of nervous system. Material doses of tincture.
